title: Vysnc problem in LOL
body:
Having some issues with the LOL v sync.

I overclocked my HP27xw monitor to 75hz through nvidia control panel. blur busters confirmed i am running at 75hz.
In games like Overwatch when I set the FPS to be display based it hovers around 74FPS, as expected.

but in LOL if I select wait for v-sync it is hard stuck on 60 FPS. Anyone else have this problem?

replies.body: This is a peculiar case, especially with overclocking.  You'll want to his us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can work with you individually to find some options for you.  It will also help to grab some logs from our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get some more context as well.  See ya there!
